Description: Blue glazed composition shabti of Irethoreru born of Asetkheb with a lappet-wig, a worn face with a beard, crossed hands in relief(missing) holding an incised hoe, adze and the string of the seed-basket that hangs over the shoulder, the legs are inscribed with eight rows of painted hieroglyphs(worn); there is a back-pillar and a plinth beneath the feet.
